title: How to Make Soapy Water Garden Spray

steps.headline: Purchase soap powder.
steps.description: Check that it is pure and does not contain chemical additives.

steps.headline: Mix the soap powder and water together.
Transfer the mixture to a spray bottle.
Use immediately.
steps.description: There is no point storing this spray mixture  - discard unwanted mixture down the drain.

text: Purchase soap powder. Check that it is pure and does not contain chemical additives. Mix the soap powder and water together.  Transfer the mixture to a spray bottle.  Use immediately. There is no point storing this spray mixture  - discard unwanted mixture down the drain.
sentences: Check that it is pure and does not contain chemical additives.
